title: [Skin] Pool Party Rek'Sai Recall Glitch

embed.description: Just a clip to display the bug that happens when your recall. Pool Party Rek'Sai and anything associated with it belongs to Riot Games.

body:
[Video not by me] 
So, I personally haven't ran into this glitch (mostly because of the fact I don't own Rek'Sai let alone her Pool Party skin), but I saw another post on here on it, but it was worded a bit off, and didn't have an example. But anywho, to explain, the recall animation goes up until about 6 seconds, to which it then stops, right before Rek'Sai jumps out and catches the frog.

replies.body:
Hey LordOontz,

This issue should be resolved with the new patch. :]
Yes Bro :D Thats the Glitch thanks alot for the help
